metadata.title: CVE-2021-3743 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An out-of-bounds (OOB) memory read flaw was found in the Qualcomm IPCrouter protocol in the Linux kernel. A missing sanity check allows a localattacker to gain access to out-of-bounds memory, leading to a system crashor a leak of internal kernel information. The highest threat from thisvulnerability is to system availability.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
